definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to shake/to vibrate/to jolt/to quake/excited/shocked/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing thunder/☳

sentences.english: Seismologists caution the public that their work is still an inexact science.
sentences.chinese: 地震學家提醒公衆，他們的研究仍然無法十分精確。

sentences.english: The most basic tool of seismologists is the seismograph network.
sentences.chinese: 地震學家最基本的工具是地震儀網。

sentences.english: "Seismology is the heart of what we do, " he said.
sentences.chinese: “地震學是我們研究的中心課題，”他說。

sentences.english: He is a famous seismology expert.
sentences.chinese: 他是有名的地震學專家。

sentences.english: Now financial seismology is where it's all at.
sentences.chinese: 如今，金融地震學正當紅。

sentences.english: Many seismologists did not foresee this situation occurs.
sentences.chinese: 許多地震學家都沒預見到會發生此種情況。

sentences.english: The study of seismology enables us to know more about earthquakes.
sentences.chinese: 地震學的研究讓我們認識地震。

sentences.english: Seismologists from all over the world flooded to the seismic zones to help.
sentences.chinese: 全球各地的地震學家湧到地震區協助。

sentences.english: How do seismologists locate an earthquake?
sentences.chinese: 地震學家是怎麼確定地震位置的？

sentences.english: This state of affairs by the world-wide attention of seismologists.
sentences.chinese: 這一事態受到世界範圍內的地震學家的廣泛關注。

sentences.english: He had just received a doctorate in recognition of his contributions to seismology .
sentences.chinese: 他剛被授予了博士頭銜以表彰他對地震學作出的貢獻。

sentences.english: In this paper, a series of seismological problems relating to the 1975 Haicheng Earthquake, Liaoning Province are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了海城地震的一系列地震學研究問題。
